texto1:
The H 407 motorway is the most modern operated motorway in the world, with a totally electronic and free toll system.

The typical section consists of two carriageways of three traffic lanes each on the West section, and two traffic lanes on the East section, as well as 3m wide inner and outer shoulders. On the West section, the central reserve is urban, with a dimension of 7,5m between shoulder inner edges and provided with a guard-rail. The platform is left ready for a future enlargement to a fourth lane on the outside. On the East section, the central reserve is of rural type, and has 29.5m between shoulder inner edges.
